data.title: Map & Directions
data.meta_description: Map & Directions Located in the historic Western Reserve region of Ohio, Hiram College is centrally located in Northeast Ohio between Cleveland and Pittsburgh. Image: Hiram Campus, Oliver Plaza Getting to Hiram From the west side of Cleveland Take I-480 east to Route 422 (toward Solon). Proceed east on Route 422 to Route 700. Go...
data.text:
Getting to Hiram

From the west side of Cleveland

Take I-480 east to Route 422 (toward Solon). Proceed east on Route 422 to Route 700. Go south for 5 miles on Route 700 into Hiram.

From the east side of Cleveland

Go south on I-271 and then east to Route 422 (toward Solon). Proceed east on Route 422 to Route 700. Go south for 5 miles on Route 700 into Hiram.

From downtown Cleveland

Take I-77 south to I-480. Take I-480 east to Route 422. Proceed east on Route 422 to Route 700. Go south for 5 miles on Route 700 into Hiram.

From the Akron and Canton areas

Take I-77 north. Continue north on Route 8 and proceed to the Ohio Turnpike (I-80). Take I-80 east to Exit 193 (Ravenna). Proceed north on Route 44. Go east on Route 82 to Hiram.

From the Akron and Canton area (alternate)

Take I-76 to Route 44 (Ravenna); follow Route 44 north to Route 82; go east on Route 82 to Freedom and turn left on to Route 700. Follow Route 700 into Hiram.

From the Youngstown Area

Take the Ohio Turnpike (I-80) to exit 193 (Ravenna). Proceed north on Route 44. Go east on Route 82 to Hiram.

From the Warren area

Take Route 422 West. Turn left on Route 305. Travel west on Route 305 into Hiram.

From Pittsburgh and Washington, D.C.

Take Pennsylvania Turnpike (I-76) to the Ohio Turnpike (I-80). Take I-80 west to Exit 193 (Ravenna). Proceed north on Route 44. Go east on Route 82 to Hiram.

From northern New England and northern New York State

Take the New York Thruway (I-90) west and proceed into Ohio. Exit at Route 528 (Madison) and drive south. At Route 87, turn right and proceed west to Burton. In the center of Burton, pick up Route 700 in the traffic circle and proceed south to Hiram.

From Chicago and points west

Take the Indiana Toll Road (I-80/90) east to the Ohio Turnpike (I-80). Take I-80 east to exit 193 (Ravenna). Proceed north on Route 44. Go east on Route 82 to Hiram.

From Cincinnati and points south

Take I-71 north to I-271. Proceed north on I-271. Exit at Route 82 and east to Hiram.
